properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS_CD != 302
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_STATUS_CD != 302 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS MODIFY_DT, CATEGORY_CD, CATEGORY_NM, READ_COUNT, BOARD_STATUS_NM FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_CD) JOIN BOARD_STATUS USING(BOARD_STATUS_CD) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS_CD != 302
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT+1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
